Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, this is one of my first post so I'm sorry if I make an error.


I make designs on the page kerbalx.com, I've been doing it for a while.
Recently, I discovered the Infernal Robotics mod and it was just what I needed for my latest design, foldable wings.
In that mod, there are hinges that are the part I need for this, and this is where my problem starts.


When I make a hinge, I mount the wing on it, and I set it up, it works perfectly, the wing moves to its configured position without problems.
But when I put 2 hinges, the madness begins. In the editor work perfectly, both wings open outwardly unfolding correctly, but once inside the game the hinges go crazy, the 2 are just leaving the axes causing graphic and structural problems in the ship, do not move as in the editor and they end up breaking.


I need help with this, to know if someone has happened to him, or if it is a problem with the configuration of the mod.
I have to say, I have sought help and the only advice I found was 'disable Auto-Struts' (Advanced Tweakables) but I already did it and the problem is still there.
Does anyone know why this happens?
Before anything thanks to everyone!

Hm. I use the mod, (well, a slightly editied version of the mod) and haven’t had those problems. What game and mod version are you running? It might be something to do with the plane itself, maybe try it with another ship?

Hi! Thanks for reply!

I use KSP 1.2 and i have tested some versions, the game let me to play with IR-2.0.12 Final Core version. Upper versions are not supported in 1.2, i have tested it in a new ship, only cockpit and the hinges, and the problem still there. In 5 minutes i will post images, so you can see what happens.

Thanks again friend!

This is my problem:

1 hinge works good

Original Position 1 Hinge

Final Position 1 Hinge

Now try with 2 hinges

Original Position 2 Hinges

Final Position 2 Hinges

And finally this is the result...

1 hour ago, MiffedStarfish said:

Hm. I use the mod, (well, a slightly editied version of the mod) and haven’t had those problems. What game and mod version are you running? It might be something to do with the plane itself, maybe try it with another ship? 

Hi! Thanks for reply!

I use KSP 1.2 and i have tested some versions, the game let me to play with IR-2.0.12 Final Core version. Upper versions are not supported in 1.2, i have tested it in a new ship, only cockpit and the hinges, and the problem still there. In 5 minutes i will post images, so you can see what happens.

Thanks again friend!
Moved to the Add-on Discussions area of the forum.

7 minutes ago, Ten Key said:

Moved to the Add-on Discussions area of the forum. 

Solved! If anyone have this problem, it is a problem wiht KJR mod! Thanks!!
